headline: Estée Lauder Announces Actress Daisy Edgar-Jones as Newest Global Brand Ambassador
summary: NEW YORK, January 08, 2026--Estée Lauder today announced that it has signed acclaimed British actress, Daisy Edgar-Jones, as its newest Global Brand Ambassador. Daisy will represent Estée Lauder skin care, makeup, and fragrance, with her first campaign debuting on February 2nd across print, digital and in-store. She joins Estée Lauder’s current roster of global talent including Ana de Armas, Bianca Brandolini, Carolyn Murphy, Imaan Hammam, IU, Karlie Kloss, Paulina Porizkova and Yang Mi.
